short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Digital Chaos, DC' with 'SUNSfan', cause we all know who is running the show.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension changes "DC, Digital Chaos" etc to SUNSfan. We all know who is running the show, and he should be recognized. He doesn't get enough credit, so install this extension to show your support.
